ارجنٹینا نے فیفا ورلڈ کپ ایک بار جیتا ہے: How many times has Argentina won the FIFA World Cup? Argentina FIFA World Cup wins
How many times has Argentina won the FIFA World Cup? Argentina FIFA World Cup wins

The other nations to win the FIFA World Cup more than once are Argentina (3), France (2) and Uruguay (2). While Argentina triumphed in 1978, 1986 and 2022, Uruguay were victorious in 1930 and 1950. France won it in 1998 and 2018.
